comment.author: Annika
comment.text: Love you Mr President.....You and your family will look good in the white house.

replies.author: Alyssa
replies.text: Yes... Some people with class for a change !!!

replies.author: Natalie
replies.text: His daughter is very well spoken and very classy!

replies.author: Christian
replies.text: Some class in the White House...been too long!
